meanings.sent1: The geologist found a rare pyroxenoid in the rock formation.
meanings.sent2: Miners discovered a new pyroxenoid deep underground.
meanings.sent3: The pyroxenoid seemed to wink at the geologist, making him chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The pyroxenoid sparkled like a hidden treasure in the earth.
meanings.sent5: The unique color of the pyroxenoid made it stand out among the other minerals.

meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the pyroxenoid crystals under a microscope.
meanings.sent2: Her necklace was adorned with beautiful pyroxenoid stones.
meanings.sent3: The pyroxenoid sky reminded him of a painting by a famous artist.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes shone with a pyroxenoid brilliance in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The pyroxenoid pattern on the fabric was intricate and mesmerizing.
